subject: Fish and Other Marine Life
Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: A coral atoll some 1,200 miles south of Honolulu, part of the island nation of Kiribati, offers a feeding ground to the pugnacious giant trevally.
snippet: A coral atoll some 1,200 miles south of Honolulu, part of the island nation of Kiribati, offers a feeding ground to the pugnacious giant trevally.
